name: Orbs Match Christmas: Blast 3, 2 icy ball puzzle
name_original: Orbs Match Christmas: Blast 3, 2 icy ball puzzle
description:
Orbs Match Christmas is a fun match-3 game featuring a lovely christmas theme!, playing it is super easy: just move the orbs to make matches of 3 or more before the orbs overflow or time runs out.

Features:
- Fun Addictive Match 3 gameplay.
- Beautiful Retina Graphics.
- Great Music and Sound Effects.
- Lots of Levels to complete.
- Special gifts to make great combos.
- 3 Difficulty settings.
- Close any time and resume later.

Great time killer for puzzle and christmas lovers!

More info at www.boviosoft.com
